full_description:
Haier H32D2M 32 Inch Miracast HD Non-Smart LED Television

Haier H32D2M is a 32 Inch Miracast HD Non-Smart LED Television. The Panel Type of this TV is DLED. It has a System of Analog TVï¼ˆVIDEO/AUDIO) of PAL/BG. But as it is part of the H-Cast Series it supports Miracast. The Aspect Ratio is 16:9. The resolution support is 1366x768 pixels with a refresh rate of 60Hz. The Contrast ratio is 3000:1 with a response time of 6.5ms. The viewable Angle (H/V) of this TV is  178 degrees. It supports Standard, Dynamic, Mild, User, ECO Picture Modes with digital Comb Filter and Noice Reduction. It supports Standard, Music, Movie, User Audio Mode with Dolby Digital Decoding and Auto-Volume leveler. The Audio Output Power is12W in each speaker with a mute supported Stereo Speaker. It has three HDMI, and one USB port with USB Playback. It has one RF Input and one composite, and one 15 Pin D-sub(VGA/PC)port. It has a HeadPhone jack with PC Audio and Component Input. This TV comes with Hotel Mode, and Sleep Time.The voltage Range is 100V~240V with a 3D Comb Filter. It supports USB Version 2.0. and Standard/Dynamic, Mild, User, ECO Multi-Picture Modes with Cool, Normal, Warm Color temperature supported. It also comes equipped with HDMI CEC. Haier H32D2M 32 Inch Miracast HD Non-Smart LED Television offers 4 Years Panel Warranty and 2 Years Parts & Service Warranty. Haier Warranty Card must be kept for warranty claims.

Haier H32K800X 32 Inch Bezel Less HD Google TV

The Haier H32K800X is a modern 32-inch HD television designed to deliver an exceptional viewing experience with its bezel-less design and smart TV capabilities. The HD resolution (1366 x 768) provides clear and crisp visuals, perfect for watching your favorite movies and shows. Equipped with a robust ARM A55*4 CPU running at 1.5GHz, it ensures smooth performance for all your entertainment needs. Multiple connectivity options, including three HDMI ports, two USB ports, RF input, composite input, headphone jack, Wi-Fi, and Ethernet LAN, make it easy to connect various devices such as gaming consoles, Blu-ray players, and external storage. This 32-inch TV is powered by Android 11.0, granting access to popular streaming services like Netflix, YouTube, and Amazon Prime Video, along with a wide range of other apps. The integration of Google TV and Google Assistant offers a user-friendly interface and the convenience of voice commands to control your TV and search for content. Dolby Audio technology enhances the audio experience, providing high-quality sound for movies, music, and games. By maximizing screen real estate and reducing external distractions, the svelte bezel-less design provides an immersive viewing experience. With a 178-degree horizontal and vertical viewing angle, the TV makes sure that everyone in the space can see a crisp, colorful image. With richer and more dynamic graphics, HDR technology significantly improves contrast and color accuracy, bringing your entertainment to life. You can effortlessly cast material from your tablet or smartphone straight to the TV screen thanks to built-in Chromecast functionality. The Haier H32K800X 32" TV features advanced audio settings, including multiple sound modes, Dolby Digital decoding, stereo speakers, auto-volume leveling, and sound balance. Convenient functions such as auto-timer on/off, child-lock, Bluetooth remote, and digital noise reduction enhance the overall user experience. The audio performance is also remarkable, with two stereo speakers producing a combined 20W of output power (10W x 2). The TV's sleek, contemporary style with its thin, bezel-less frame complements any interior décor, and the dual black stand that comes with it just makes it seem better. It is easy to access and enjoy your favorite material thanks to the user-friendly design, which makes it simple to navigate between menus and apps.
